Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->SUPER::_init($data);
	$self->set_where($$data{WHERE});
	$self->is_constitutive($$data{CONSTITUTIVE});
	
	return $self;
}
get_slicedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_slice {
	return $_[0]->{WHERE} ;
}
get_spliced_relative_3pdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_3p {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_stop;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_start;
	}
}
get_spliced_relative_5pdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_5p {
	my ($self) = @_;
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_start;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_stop;
	}
}
get_spliced_relative_startdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_start {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->to_spliced_relative($self->get_start);
}
get_spliced_relative_stopdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_relative_stop {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->to_spliced_relative($self->get_stop);
}
get_spliced_start_relative_to_slicedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_start_relative_to_slice {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_5p;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_slice->get_exonic_length - $self->get_spliced_relative_5p - 1;
	}
}
get_spliced_stop_relative_to_slicedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_spliced_stop_relative_to_slice {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_strand == 1) {
		return $self->get_spliced_relative_3p;
	}
	else {
		return $self->get_slice->get_exonic_length - $self->get_spliced_relative_3p - 1;
	}
}
get_wheredescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_where {
	return $_[0]->{WHERE} ;
}
is_constitutivedescriptionprevnextTop
sub is_constitutive {
	if (defined $_[1]) {
		$_[0]->{CONSTITUTIVE} = $_[1];
	}
	else {
		return $_[0]->{CONSTITUTIVE};
	}
}
set_wheredescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_where {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{WHERE} = $value;
		weaken($self->{WHERE}); # circular reference needs to be weakened to avoid memory leaks
	}
}
to_spliced_relativedescriptionprevnextTop
sub to_spliced_relative {
	my ($self, $abs_pos) = @_;
	
	if (defined $self->get_slice and $self->get_slice->is_position_within_exon($abs_pos)) {
		my $relative_pos = $abs_pos - $self->get_slice->get_start;
		my $introns = $self->get_slice->get_introns;
		foreach my $intron (@$introns) {
			if ($intron->get_stop < $abs_pos) {
				$relative_pos -= $intron->get_length;
			}
			else {
				last;
			}
		}
		return $relative_pos;
	}
	else {
		return undef;
	}
}
whatamidescriptionprevnextTop
sub whatami {
	return 'Exon';
}
